Settings.QueryText: SELECT CASE WHEN WorkOrder.Posted AND WorkOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus <> VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) THEN CASE WHEN RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND TimeSchedulePlan.Order IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN WorkOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND WorkOrder.Closed THEN 2 ELSE 0 END ELSE CASE WHEN ISNULL(RunSchedule.Completed, 0) = 0 AND ISNULL(TimeSchedulePlan.Completed, 0) = 0 THEN CASE WHEN WorkOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT WorkOrder.Closed THEN CASE WHEN WorkOrder.Finish < &CurrentDateTimeSession THEN 6 WHEN WorkOrder.Start <= &CurrentDateSession AND WorkOrder.Finish >= &CurrentDateTimeSession THEN 4 ELSE 2 END ELSE 2 END ELSE CASE WHEN WorkOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT WorkOrder.Closed THEN CASE WHEN WorkOrder.Finish < &CurrentDateTimeSession THEN 5 WHEN WorkOrder.Start <= &CurrentDateSession AND WorkOrder.Finish >= &CurrentDateTimeSession THEN 3 ELSE 1 END ELSE 1 END END END ELSE 2 END AS ShipmentPictureNumber, CASE WHEN WorkOrder.Posted AND NOT WorkOrder.Closed AND WorkOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS OrderInProcess, CASE WHEN RunSchedule.Order IS NULL AND TimeSchedulePlan.Order IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ForShipment, WorkOrder.Ref AS Ref, WorkOrder.DeletionMark AS DeletionMark, WorkOrder.Number AS Number, WorkOrder.Date AS Date, WorkOrder.Posted AS Posted, WorkOrder.Author AS Author, WorkOrder.BankAccount AS BankAccount, WorkOrder.DocumentCurrency AS DocumentCurrency, WorkOrder.WorkKind AS WorkKind, WorkOrder.DiscountMarkupKind AS DiscountMarkupKind, WorkOrder.PriceKind AS PriceKind, WorkOrder.Contract AS Contract, WorkOrder.Closed AS Closed, WorkOrder.SetPaymentTerms AS SetPaymentTerms, WorkOrder.PettyCash AS PettyCash, WorkOrder.Comment AS Comment, WorkOrder.Counterparty AS Counterparty, WorkOrder.Counterparty.ContactPerson AS ContactPerson, WorkOrder.Multiplicity AS Multiplicity, WorkOrder.ExchangeRate AS ExchangeRate, WorkOrder.IncludeVATInPrice AS IncludeVATInPrice, WorkOrder.Company AS Company, WorkOrder.Responsible AS Responsible, WorkOrder.Project AS Project, WorkOrder.Event AS Event, WorkOrder.OrderState AS OrderState, WorkOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus AS OrderStateState, CASE WHEN (WorkOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR WorkOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess)) AND NOT WorkOrder.Closed THEN &InProcess ELSE CASE WHEN WorkOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Completed) THEN &Completed ELSE &Canceled END END AS OrderStatus, WorkOrder.Start AS Start, WorkOrder.SalesStructuralUnit AS SalesStructuralUnit, WorkOrder.StructuralUnitReserve AS StructuralUnitReserve, WorkOrder.AmountIncludesVAT AS AmountIncludesVAT, WorkOrder.DocumentAmount AS DocumentAmount, WorkOrder.CashAssetsType AS CashAssetsType, WorkOrder.Finish AS Finish, WorkOrder.PointInTime AS PointInTime FROM Document.WorkOrder AS WorkOrder LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrderFulfillmentSchedule AS RunSchedule ON WorkOrder.Ref = RunSchedule.Order AND (RunSchedule.Period <= &CurrentDateSession) LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrderFulfillmentSchedule AS TimeSchedulePlan ON WorkOrder.Ref = TimeSchedulePlan.Order AND (TimeSchedulePlan.Period > &CurrentDateSession)
